Address.label: Address
Address.value: TWO NORTH NINTH STREET, ALLENTOWN, Pennsylvania, 18101-1179, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: PPL is a holding company of regulated utilities in Pennsylvania, Kentucky, and Rhode Island. The Pennsylvania regulated delivery and transmission segment distributes electricity to customers in central and eastern Pennsylvania. LG&E and KU are involved in regulated electricity generation, transmission, and distribution in Kentucky. The Kentucky utilities also serve gas customers. Narragansett operates electric and gas utilities in Rhode Island.

value.name: Francis X. Sullivan
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
